name: Rock Wall
description: When this Wildkin switches in, it gets +2 Shield until your next turn.

name: Tuck In
description: When this Wildkin switches in, it heals itself for 2 HP.

name: Pounce
description: When this Wildkin switches in, immediately deal 1 damage to the opponent's active Wildkin.

name: Sharpen Claws
description: When this Wildkin switches in, its next attack deals +2 damage.

name: Surprise Strike
description: When this Wildkin switches in, immediately deal 3 damage to the opponent's Active Wildkin.

name: Soothing Song
description: When this Wildkin switches in, your entire team (active and benched) heals for 3 HP.

name: Helping Hand
description: When this Wildkin switches in, it heals any one Wildkin for 3 HP.
